body:
Hey! So recently I have wanted to open up to the community more and let you guys get to know me a bit. My name is Josh, I joined Avicus/mczone around 2013, and have loved it ever since, I have interests such as soccer, reading, video games, helping others and having some fun. Ask me anything, (tho keep it PG).

PS: I don't really know everyone yet so bare with me if I am not able to answer some "opinions on me" questions.
body_tagged:
Hey! So recently I have wanted to open up to the community more and let you guys get to know me a bit. My name is Josh, I joined Avicus/mczone around 2013, and have loved it ever since, I have interests such as soccer, reading, video games, helping others and having some fun. Ask me anything, (tho keep it PG).

PS: I don't really know everyone yet so bare with me if I am not able to answer some "opinions on me" questions.

I like superman, I love lions - "SuperLion" but it looks ugly af, then once I typed to fast and did "SSuperLion" though still didn't like it tried it with double "L" as well, and finally did "SSuperLLion". 

PS: I know who SSundee is, but I didn't at the time.

replies.body:
Opinions? I think you are a great mod, always have been, and you seem like a nice calm person to approach, you are easy too talk because of your friendly nature.

Have you played Overwatch? Yeah! Who hasn't? :P

Favorite subject in school? Probably writing, tho that was intermediate, I'm starting high school this year so writing might not be as fun.

Favorite memory on Avicus? Finding Avicus Network/mc zone, that or the walls in general.

replies.body:
Opinions?
Opinions on Australia?
What in your opinion makes Avicus unique?
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions?
Opinions on Australia?
What in your opinion makes Avicus unique?

replies.body:
Opinions? I say you are a really chill dude, friendly, nice to talk to, you have plenty memes up your sleeves and you are a great mod, you really deserved the promotion congratz again.

Opinions on Australia? Never been but, I have had a lot of friends on like skype and discord from Australia who are really nice so I guess Australia has nice people? Bad part is, I am not a fan of snakes or spiders and would most likely never sleep at night, too busy being haunted by the thought of a a huge spider laying eggs in my ears.

What in your opinion makes Avicus unique? The wonderful community it has.

replies.body:
How old are you? I am 12 years old, 13 on April the 1st.
Where are you from? NZ FTW.
Were you staff on another server before? Nope.
Any pets? I have two cats, not sure what kinds...just too female cats.
What do you think the staff team currently lacks of? And how would you improve it? I think the staff team is fine, they might be inactive at times but like I can't blame them school is starting and you all have other priorities that come first.
Opinions on  PieZ? Don't really know him much, though I have seen him online sometimes, he seems like a nice chill guy that I wouldn't mind to get to know better.

Favourite map? I love frostbite <3.

If you had to play one game for the rest of your life, what would it be?

replies.body:
Favourite Avicus stage? Like time eg Mczone or year?.. Tbh, my favorite would have to be Mczone, basically because the player base was quite high back then, which resulted in more games being played.

Where do you see your self in 5 years? I honestly don't know, it's not something I have taken time
to think about.

replies.body:
1. How well do you know your memes? 5/10.
2. Have you ever posted an Italian meme? Nope.
3. Would you ever post an Italian meme? Probably not.
4. Opinions? You are a really cool guy to talk to, I enjoy playing games with you, though like I say to most people, we need to talk more, msg me next time you see me.
